subscribePremiumDesc: Subscribe to unlock new features and if eligible, receive a share of revenue.

credentialsSignup.dateOfBirthDesc: This will not be shown publicly. Confirm your own age, even if this account is for a business, a pet, or something else.
credentialsSignup.passwordChoiceNote: Make sure it's 8 characters or more.
credentialsSignup.uploadDesc: Have a favorite selfie? Upload it now.
credentialsSignup.youCanChangeUsernameLater: Your @username is unique. You can always change it later
credentialsSignup.notificationsDesc: Get the most out of x by staying up to date with what's happening

passwordResetFlow.desc: Enter the email, or username associated with your account to change your password.
passwordResetFlow.codeSentDesc: Check your email to get your confirmation code. If you need to request a new code, go back and reselect a confirmation.
passwordResetFlow.passwordResetedMessage: Your password reseted successfully, you will redirect to homepage
passwordResetFlow.chooseNewPasswordDesc: Make sure your new password is 8 characters or more. Try including numbers, letters, and punctuation marks for a strong password.
passwordResetFlow.chooseNewPasswordWarning: You'll be logged out of all active X sessions after your password is changed.

usernameAlreadyTaken_chooseDifferent: Username already has been taken. choose something different
notPostedMediaSubMessage: Once they do, those posts will show up here.
youHasNotPostedMediaSubMessage: Once you do, those posts will show up here.
bookmarksNotFoundMessage: When bookmark a post, you'll find it here.
notificationsNotFoundMessage: When someone like or follow you, or reply to your post. You will find it here
postsWithTagNotFound: Posts with {tag} tag was not found
unfollowMessage: {user} now is not in your followings
featureNotAvailable: This feature is not available for now.
deletePostWarning: This can't be undone and it will be removed from your profile, the timeline of any accounts that follow you, and from search results.
alreadyIsPremium: You are already subscribed to premium.
accountUpgrated: Your account successfully upgraded to premium
redirectingToHome: You'll be redirect back in a few seconds
upgradeDesc: Enjoy an enhanced experience, exclusive creator tools, top-tier verification and security.
subscribeNote: By subscribing, you agree to our Purchaser Terms of Service. Subscriptions auto-renew until canceled. Cancel anytime,  at least 24 hours prior to renewal to avoid additional charges. Manage your subscription through the platform you subscribed on.
